Classes in se.nicklasgavelin.sphero used by se.nicklasgavelin.sphero
DriveAlgorithm
          Base abstract class for algorithms that are used to calculate heading, speed and any other necessary parameter for driving the Sphero robot directly using the Robot.drive method.
DriveAlgorithm.OnConvertListener
          Listener class, listens for conversion events
Robot
          Robot class.
Robot.RobotLED
          Manages the RGB and LED brightness information to prevent storing this directly in objects in the Robot instance.
Robot.RobotMovement
          Holds the robot position, rotation rate and the drive algorithm used.
Robot.RobotRawMovement
          Raw movement values for the robot.
